header.mainContainer: common-main-header-container w-full p-1 w-full bg-white shadow-md transition-all flex flex-row flex-wrap items-center justify-between lg:z-2 lg:px-10 lg:py-4 print:shadow-none print:border-b
header.optionsContainer: common-header-options-container w-auto select-disabled flex flex-row flex-nowrap items-center justify-start lg:hidden lg:w-auto lg:h-auto print:hidden

routeTitleSection.routeTitleContainer: common-route-title-container flex-grow ml-2 flex flex-row flex-nowrap justify-start lg:ml-6
routeTitleSection.routeTitle: common-route-title w-fit max-w-[220px] text-left text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider lg:max-w-full print:w-full print:text-center print:text-xl

profileSection.profileContainer: common-profile-container hidden w-0 select-disabled cursor-pointer transition-all flex-row flex-nowrap items-center justify-end lg:flex lg:w-auto print:hidden

menu.mainContainer: common-menu-container menu-container absolute top-0 left-0 z-10 h-full min-w-0 max-w-full bg-themeMain-reg text-white shadow-inner transition-all duration-100 lg:block print:hidden
menu.innerContainer: common-menu-container-inner sticky top-0 flex flex-col flex-nowrap justify-start
menu.companyLogo: common-company-logo relative w-full my-4 p-4 bg-no-repeat bg-center overflow-hidden transition-all flex flex-col flex-nowrap items-center justify-center
menu.linkClasses: common-menu-link relative w-full p-4 text-gray-50 no-underline opacity-80 overflow-hidden cursor-pointer transition-all flex flex-row flex-nowrap items-center overflow-hidden justify-start hover:opacity-100 hover:bg-themeMain-dark
menu.logoutClasses: common-menu-logout relative w-full bg-no-repeat bg-center flex flex-col flex-nowrap items-center justify-center

dashboard.mainContainer: common-dashboard-container relative w-full h-full shadow-top-bottom flex flex-col flex-nowrap justify-center
dashboard.innerContainer: common-dashboard-container-inner w-full h-full py-5 bg-white bg-opacity-95 flex flex-col flex-nowrap justify-center
dashboard.messageClasses: common-dashboard-user-message w-full p-5 text-center text-gray-600 flex flex-col flex-nowrap items-center justify-center
dashboard.panelsGrid: common-dashboard-panels-grid items-grid w-full h-full max-w-massive px-6 flex flex-col flex-wrap items-center justify-center lg:flex-row lg:px-2
dashboard.panelMainContainer: common-dashboard-panel-container w-full max-w-[280px] p-2 transition-all flex flex-col flex-nowrap items-center justify-center lg:w-1/4 lg:h-15 lg:max-w-full
dashboard.panelInnerContainer: common-dashboard-panel-container-inner w-full h-full px-4 py-5 bg-opacity-80 rounded text-center uppercase no-underline cursor-pointer shadow-md border transition-all flex flex-col flex-nowrap items-center justify-evenly hover:shadow-lg

pagination.mainContainer: common-pagination-container w-full py-0 px-5 mb-5 mt-7 mx-auto flex flex-row flex-nowrap items-center justify-start
pagination.innerContainer: common-pagination-container-inner w-full flex flex-row flex-nowrap items-center justify-center

pagesContainer.pageNavigationContainer: common-pagination-previous-container max-w-full w-auto flex flex-col flex-nowrap items-center justify-center
pagesContainer.numbersContainer: common-pagination-numbers-container min-w-auto w-auto max-w-full flex flex-row flex-nowrap items-center justify-center
pagesContainer.arrowIcon: common-pagination-arrow-icon block w-2.5 h-2.5 m-0 border-t-2 border-r-2 border-gray-700 transform transition-all hover:border-themeMain-reg
pagesContainer.pageLink: common-pagination-page-link relative flex-grow min-w-2 my-0 mx-1 py-2.5 px-4 text-xs font-normal lowercase rounded-sm border border-transparent transition-all flex flex-col flex-nowrap items-center justify-center lg:text-sm hover:border-themeMain-dark
pagesContainer.pageLinkActive: common-pagination-page-link--active current-page text-white bg-themeMain-reg cursor-default shadow-md

table.rowClasses: common-table-row w-full my-8 border-r border-l border-gray-300 shadow-md font-themeMontserrat transition-all flex flex-col flex-nowrap items-center justify-start lg:border-l-0 lg:border-r-0 lg:border-b lg:py-3 lg:my-0 lg:shadow-none lg:flex-row lg:bg-white lg:hover:bg-gray-100
table.cellClasses: common-table-cell flex-grow w-full py-2 border-b border-gray-300 flex flex-row flex-nowrap items-center justify-center last:border-b-0 lg:py-0 lg:border-b-0 lg:border-r lg:first:border-l lg:first:border-t-0 lg:last:border-b-0
table.cellTitleClasses: common-table-cell-title w-1/2 px-4 py-2 border-r border-gray-300 text-center text-xxs font-semibold lg:hidden lg:w-full lg:border-r-0 lg:text-xs
table.cellValueClasses: common-table-cell-value w-1/2 px-2 py-1 text-center text-xxs lg:w-full
table.cellValueLinkClasses: common-table-cell-value-link w-1/2 text-center text-xxs flex flex-row flex-nowrap justify-center lg:w-full
table.cellValueDocumentClasses: common-table-cell-value-document w-full h-full  px-4 py-2 w-full h-full no-underline outline-none rounded-md cursor-pointer flex flex-col flex-nowrap items-center justify-center
table.cellValueIconButtonClasses: common-table-cell-value-icon w-auto flex flex-col flex-nowrap items-center justify-center
